metadata.title: Summertime Nano/Microplankton Communities in the Eastern Bering Sea

creators.name: University of Alaska Fairbanks (UAF), School of Fisheries
Ocean Sciences (SFOS), Institute of Marine Science (IMS)

metadata.description:
Samples of nano/microplankton abundance will be taken at six depths (surface, mixed layer, chlorophyll max, pycnocline and two deep samples) to characterize the water column and obtain integrated biomass.

An NPMR project
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Data supporting NPMR project  "Summertime Nutrient Properties Related to Plankton Blooms in the Eastern Bering Sea"

Status: Planned

Maintenance frequency: Unknown

Access constraints: None
